sub_title: Core Banking Transformation| FinTech| Program Management| Agile| Management Consulting| Architecture| BFSI|
summary:
• 23 years of international experience in Fintech industry especially Core Banking Implementations, focussed on Application and Business Analysis, Management Consultancy, Sales Support and Product Management.
• Expertise in Financial Software Applications Development, Implementation and Vendor Management. Engineered systems and core banking transformation.
• Practicing Agile-SCRUM/DevOps/BizDevOps methodology with a proven track record in providing excellent project delivery service, understanding of the business as well as IT processes to meet operational/legislative needs and to help take advantage of business opportunities.
• Implementation and integration of Payment Systems, SWIFT, SEPA clearing, ISO-8583 and ISO 20022, Deposits and Loans, Trade Finance & Treasury along with Regulatory Reporting and Basel Compliance requirements.
• Good organizer, excellent communicator, and a listener with very good interpersonal skills.
• Experience in understanding requirements, documenting specifications, modeling/designing solutions, Analysing alternatives and communicating with various stakeholders to arrive at an optimal way forward.
• Works well in team environments as well as individual assignments.

Specialties: Core Banking Transformation / Enterprise Architecture, Solution Design and Implementation programs, Payments, Business Analysis, Product Fitment studies and Gap Analysis, Financial Software Application Implementation, Consulting, Change Management, System Integration, Corporate Banking, Stakeholder Management and Project Management with distributed teams in an onsite-offshore model. Agile- Scrum, DevOps, BizDevOps project delivery.

PROFESSIONAL OBJECTIVES 
To work in a professional environment that continuously provides challenges and growth opportunities. To work with an organization that fosters entrepreneurship, value creation and brings out the best in the employees.

PROFESSIONAL CERTIFICATIONS:
The Open Group Certified TOGAF 9 Foundation
Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Foundations 2020 Certified Associate
PMI certified project management professional (PMP)® 
Professional Scrum Master I
ISTQB Certified

profile_positions.description:
Global Core Banking Transformation for Tier-1 Bank's Wholesale and International business.
Engagement Management, Solution Architecture and Scrum Master role for implementation scrum team.
profile_positions.title: Consulting Practice Manager

profile_positions.description:
FIS and Core Banking Transformation at ING Bank N.V. 

Responsibilities
•FIS Solution Architect for core bank transformation at ING Bank N.V (Domestic).
•Team Leadership and Management.
•Participate in roadmap creation and facilitate decision making process.
•Payments Specialist, SEPA (CT, DD, Instant Payments), ISO-8583, ISO-20022.
•Agile-DevOps delivery model for core bank programe. 
•Design and implement payment interfaces and web services requirements analysis, service specifications and design finalization.
•Implementation of FIS- Profile core banking application and FIS-Xpress SOA product suite.
•Conduct workshops and prepare proof of concept for FIS applications.  
•System Integrator, SOA Governance and Integration for Core bank.
•Business analysis and Requirements gathering. Prepare solution approach and provide solution approval for DevOps delivery. FIS representative in core bank customization board at ING.
•Test Automation and implementation.
•Decommissioning of legacy mainframe applications and migrate to core bank.
•Participate in estimations process and Facilitate commercials finalization. 
•Pre-Sales Workshop for other FIS customers in The Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: IT Business Consultant Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Project Description
Core Banking Transformation at Tier 2 Dutch retail bank (erstwhile- Friesland Bank), 

Responsibilities
•Business analysis and business product finalization for FLEXCUBE implementation. Gaps Analysis, Requirements Specification, Functional Specifications and Interfaces finalization.
•Conduct workshops, assess client’s needs, solution design and mapping with business process. Monitor and Track software customizations through project life cycle events.
•Regulatory requirements analysis, specification finalization, integration planning
and releases.
•System integration planning and pilot setup, conduct workshop to demonstrate solution capabilities and feasibility.
•Software Customization testing and test support.
•Delivery management to ensure customer satisfaction and reference-ability. Overall implementation project management activities.
•Proposal Development, Contract management, Off-shore development team co-ordination and delivery obligations.(Managed Services and Implementation Services).
profile_positions.title: Consulting Practice Manager

profile_positions.description:
Project Description
During this period, I have worked on projects for existing clients.
Includes core banking software application upgrade for all installations at one of the Oracle partner firms in Iceland responsible for providing core banking application services to Icelandic Savings Bank's, Consulting services for existing customer base in Netherlands and supporting Flexcube rollout to new locations. AML interface customization solution implementation and startup activities for Core banking implementation project at erstwhile Indover bank,Amsterdam.

Responsibilities
•Consulting service for upgrade project activities, solution integration and roll-out activities. Assessed client needs and solutioning in the area of reporting and integration.
•Project manager for core banking solution implementation. System integration planning (Kondor+) and pilot setup, conduct workshop to demonstrate solution capabilities. 
•Requirements gathering and documentation. Interface specification and Product set up finalization.
•Managed and coordinated proposal and off-shore development team, authored statement of work and project initiation documentation.
•Provide training to junior consultants to enhance their skills in consulting methodology and FLEXCUBE application.
profile_positions.title: Consulting Practice Manager

profile_positions.description:
Project Description
At a leading Tier 1 French bank (NatIxis), in order to reorganize and streamline wholesale international operations and build a strong information system and processes, bank decided to centralize systems for its Pan-European operations. Single installation is catering to various
banking needs of different countries (i.e. Germany, Spain, United Kingdom, and Italy).Achieved data consistency in managing new regulatory requirements such as IAS-39, Basel II compliance, risk tracking and French regulatory reporting for head office. This implementation has helped in providing an integrated system, with technical and functional homogeneity across the international branches without compromising on local requirements.

Responsibilities	
•Lead analyst, all aspects of regulatory reporting interface development and implementation. STB Reporting (UK), FiRE regulatory reporting for Germany, Spain. TREND regulatory reporting for Italy, TEINSA regulatory reporting for Panama. Risk management and Basel compliance data handoff requirements.
•Analysis of TARGET2 regulatory compliance requirements, Implementation of Target payments migration to TARGET2 for Spain and Italy.
•Requirement study and documentation, interface design specifications, implementation and user acceptance/certification testing with respective central banks.
•Consulting services for FLEXCUBE core banking implementation activities.
profile_positions.title: Consultant, Project Lead

profile_positions.description:
Project Description
The computer center for Icelandic savings bank provides commercial banking solution; include all core banking, investment banking activities covering asset management, capital and risk management, regulatory reporting.
The Loans payment system is one of such interfaces which was developed in order to automate and also to allow foreign currency loans schedule repayment from anywhere/anytime. This was achieved by interfacing core banking system with Icelandic central bank.  

Responsibilities	
•Requirement gathering, design specifications, development and implementation activities of new interfaces.
•On-site coordinator, analysis and specifications of new requirements/enhancements requested for core banking application.
•On-site support of other FLEXCUBE interfaces primarily catering to investor services and capital markets.
profile_positions.title: Consultant, Team Lead

profile_positions.description:
Client-  
1)Rabobank International - Flexcube Upgrade.

Project Description
Rabobank international is using Flexcube core banking solution, upgraded the solution to version 6.2. This upgrade installation was on Oracle 9 iAS and thus it provides the WEB based GUI and also provided freedom to users from citrix connections and bank moved on to web based core banking solution.

Responsibilities
•Development and testing of data conversion scripts for upgrade project.
•Off-shore upgrade related activities for Rabobank specific enhancements.
•Off-shore testing and documentation and release preparation.



2)Regional support Center, Lagos (Nigeria)

Project Description
At regional support center in Lagos, personally responsible for day-to-day support activities and implementation activities as and when applicable.

Responsibilities
•On-site, team member, responsible for day-to-day support for FLEXCUBE UBS installation for four banks reporting to regional support center at Lagos.
